improvement_goals.goal: Use strong action verbs and impact statements

constraints.constraint: Do not fabricate experience or achievements
Keep total length to 1-2 pages worth of content

primary_tasks.task: Rewrite Professional Summary with target role keywords
Enhance Work Experience with quantifiable results
Optimize Skills section for ATS scanning

improvement_techniques.technique: Start bullets with: Developed, Led, Increased, Reduced, Implemented
Add metrics: percentages, dollar amounts, time saved, team size
Naturally incorporate must-have keywords from target roles

output_format.structure:
# [Full Name] [City, State] | [Phone] | [Email] | [LinkedIn] | [GitHub/Portfolio]
---
## PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY [2-3 sentences highlighting: years of experience, key skills for target role, major achievements with metrics]
---
## CORE COMPETENCIES **Technical Skills:** [Comma-separated list of relevant technologies] **Soft Skills:** [Leadership, Communication, etc.] **Methodologies:** [Agile, Scrum, etc.]
---
## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
### [Job Title] | [Company Name] **[City, State] | [Month Year] – [Month Year]**
- [Action verb] + [specific task] + [quantifiable result] - [Action verb] + [technology/tool used] + [impact with metrics] - [Action verb] + [leadership/collaboration] + [outcome] - [2-5 bullets per role, each with measurable impact]
### [Previous Job Title] | [Company Name] **[City, State] | [Month Year] – [Month Year]**
- [Similar structure as above]
---
## EDUCATION
**[Degree] in [Field]** | [University Name] [City, State] | [Graduation Year] - [Relevant coursework, honors, GPA if above 3.5]
---
## CERTIFICATIONS - [Certification Name] – [Issuing Organization] ([Year]) - [Another Certification] – [Organization] ([Year])
---
## PROJECTS / ACHIEVEMENTS (if applicable) - **[Project Name]:** [Brief description with tech stack and impact]

quality_checks.check: Each experience bullet starts with strong action verb
At least 60% of bullets have quantifiable metrics
All target role keywords incorporated naturally
Professional Summary is tailored to target roles
Total content fits on 1-2 pages when formatted

sample_input.original_bullet: "Worked on web development projects using JavaScript"

sample_output.improved_bullet: "Developed 12+ responsive web applications using React and TypeScript, optimizing performance to achieve 40% faster load times and 95+ Lighthouse scores, serving 100K+ monthly active users"

explanation.improvement: Showed measurable business impact on users

sample_professional_summary.original: "Experienced developer with skills in programming. Looking for new opportunities."
sample_professional_summary.improved: "Results-driven Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Led development of microservices platform serving 500K+ users, reducing API response time by 60%. Proven track record in agile environments, mentoring junior developers, and delivering high-impact features that increased user engagement by 35%."
sample_professional_summary.why_better: - Specific years of experience (5+) - Concrete technologies (React, Node.js, AWS) - Quantifiable achievements (500K users, 60% improvement, 35% increase) - Relevant skills for target role (microservices, mentoring, agile) - Strong action words (Led, Proven, delivering)
